attributes.action: set up an Urgent Investigation into Atos Healthcare Malpractice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the Prime Minister to Investigate the widespread and well documented reports of ' Lies' by Atos Healthcare Employees when undertaking Medical Assessments / Reports for the DWP.
These accusations are so widespread across the Country that such malpractice can only be ' policy' rather than the actions of a few rouge employees.
We ask that an Indepentent Body be set up to investigate these accusations by Claiments of ' Lies' being told by Atos Employees as well as other more serious matters such as 'sexual misconduct'

That undercover ' claimants' be used to go through the Atos Medicals so such abuses can be reported and eradicated.
That to  remedy many of these abuses it should be the Claimants  right to have the Medical Recorded at no cost to the them, as they  are often in dire financial difficulties, so each party. Atos and the Claimant has a true record of  events.

rejection.details: In order to avoid a potential breach of defamation laws, we cannot accept your petition as it is currently worded, as we cannot prove the allegations within it. You may wish to re-word it to remove these allegations and resubmit.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
